Summary: Strange circle over Mexico City east 32000ft aprox, first quiet , later in move.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Mexico City
There were no other sightings in Mexico City on or around May 27th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was watching the clouds and i can see this object reflecting silver flash. i run to take my cam (olimpus sp-500uz with default zoom). i made 4 pics with maximum zoom trying to maintain my hands pulse. i take first 2 in inside memory of the camera. i went to take xd card (near 20 seconds reseting the camera) and i can see the object starts to move. i think it could be with a speed near 300 km\h (need to calculate the cloud altitude to take this in reference). could be this a meteorological ballon? i didnt manipulate the pics with indicate circles to maintain them intacts. thanks and regards
